title: Bought Camille before BE changes, realize my mistake now.
body:
So I bought Camille... three or four days before the patch dropped with the IP to BE changes. It was my mistake for not reading intently what it was all about, but seeing the conversion rate of IP to BE made me realize the fact that I made a mistake in buying Camille too early. Any way for it to be refunded so I can still enjoy that sweet, sweet Blue Essence?
Thanks in advance!
---
_And remember, it's all for the sake of **Ultimate Hope**!_
- N. Komaeda.

replies.body:
I'm assuming you're talking about having bought her with IP but if you did with RP feel free to ignore this.

I think you misunderstood the conversion. Your old BE was multiplied and added to your IP to create your current BE balance. The IP you had before was not multiplied in any way, just added to the multiplied blue stuff.

So if you plan on refunding her and buying her back with blue essence you'll wind up with the exact same balance at the end of the day!

I am bamboozled.
Though you may be correct, there is yet another reason I'd like it refunded. Such offers standing right now are limited, and if I wish so, I could get Camille at any time.

If you were wanting to use that IP in the new BE store and just didn't realize that this was happening, go ahead and hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to look over whether she was used and how long it's been and see about getting her refunded.

o/
Thank you, poro friend! Please take a Poro Snax!
